data.message: I received an email today that said I won money from facebook. It said there was a sweepsteaks draw on January 5th, 2016.  Would you please provide an email address so that I can forward this spam to your investigators?  Thanks.

replies.message: Hi Mary. Please report this message as spam. To do so, follow these steps listed in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2cwZlDn. Thanks! -Jessica
Jessica, It came in the form of an 'email' so I don't believe the link you provided me with can be used outside of Facebook?  Is there an email address I can forward it to?
